EmailTemplate.name: Email Notification for Account Owner Change
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Ownership Change Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!AccountOwners__c.Previous_Owner__c}, Account Ownership on {!AccountOwners__c.Account__c} is changed to {!AccountOwners__c.AccountOwner__c} for {!AccountOwners__c.Show__c} show and {!AccountOwners__c.SubShow__c} SubShow by {!AccountOwners__c.LastModifiedBy} .
Link to Account Owner record: {!AccountOwners__c.Link}.
Thank you.
